Article.headline: Padmabhushan VasantDada Patil College Of Engineering
Article.para: Founded in 1990 as a humble tribute to Late Padmabhushan Vasantdada Patil this college is essentially conceived and planned to be the centre of excellence to groom potential engineers both in IT and Communication Engineering Sectors. Our dedicated and caring faculty awaits your enrollment to instill hope, inspire learning and create opportunity, as this institute is well equipped with infrastructure, qualified faculty and state of the art laboratories.
